pages.text: To give Water to animals you need a Water Trough. and fill it with water, manually with bucket or via pipes (from other mods).
To give Food to animals you need a Feeding Trough. simply put feed into inventory.
For animals that require Grass, simply craft a Grass Bale and place it nearby your animal. Working Range is 10x10x10. $(br2)Bales lasts 24 hours real time per animal.
For animals that require Hay, simply craft a Hay Bale and place it nearby your animal. Working Range is 10x10x10. $(br2)Bales lasts 24 hours real time per animal.
For animals that require Straw, simply craft a Straw Bale and place it nearby your animal. Working Range is 10x10x10. $(br2)Bales lasts 24 hours real time per animal.
To get useful information from an animal, Hold a Stick in your hand while right clicking on an animal.
